sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Custom request signing test</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var httpRequestData = new sn_auth.HttpRequestData();
httpRequestData.setEndpoint("https://api.github.com/app/installations");
httpRequestData.setHttpMethod("GET");

var credential = new sn_cc.StandardCredentialsProvider().getAuthCredentialByID("1cada45c2f0c9110d8a4d5f62799b676"); // custom jwt credentials
//var credential = new sn_cc.StandardCredentialsProvider().getAuthCredentialByID("4241818c2f0c5110d8a4d5f62799b602"); // aws credentials

gs.log(credential.getAttribute('name'));
var signingAPI = new sn_auth.RequestAuthAPI(httpRequestData, credential);

//var output = new RequestAuthGitHubInstallation().generateAuth(signingAPI);
var output = signingAPI.generateAuth();
var headers = output.getHeaderMap();
gs.log(Object.keys(output));
gs.log("Accept: " + headers['accept'] + ", Authorization: " + headers['authorization']);]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-06-07 20:28:57</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>0dcef0c82f0c5110d8a4d5f62799b60f</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>21</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Custom request signing test</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_0dcef0c82f0c5110d8a4d5f62799b60f</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-06-08 13:53:19</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
